participant_1.background:
Last year, I painted a portrait of my two small dogs.
i like to cook breakfast on sundays.
i live in a house.
I am a dancer and my spouse is a weather forecaster.
i have 4 daughters.

participant_2.background:
I like to dye my hair bright colors because it's a way to express myself and my love of nature.
I once met a celebrity while I was walking my dogs.
My weekdays are spent in a stuffy office, but on the weekends I put on my uniform and fight for the Union.
I enjoy watching the rain from the window and cuddling with my cats.
i speak french and english fluently.

content.text: Hey, how's it going?
Good, how about you?
Not bad, doing some watercolor paintings.
Oh cool, I like to paint too! What kind of paintings do you like to do?
I like to paint portraits of my family and friends. I once painted a portrait of my two small dogs.
That sounds really cute! I like to paint animals too. I once met a celebrity while I was walking my dogs.
That's awesome! What celebrity did you meet?
I met Betty White! She was so sweet and kind.
That's so cool! I love Betty White.
Me too! She's such an icon.
So, what do you do for work?
I work in an office during the week, but on the weekends I put on my uniform and fight for the Union.
That's really cool! What kind of work do you do in the office?
I'm a union representative. I help workers fight for their rights.
That sounds like important work.
It is! I'm glad I can do it.
So, what do you like to do on your days off?
I like to relax and spend time with my cats. I also enjoy watching the rain from the window.
That sounds relaxing. I like to spend time with my family and friends. I also like to paint and cook.
That sounds like a great way to spend your time.
Thanks, it is!
Well, it was nice talking to you. I hope you have a great day!
You too
